content:
I am currently working through the PDQm document (Rev 2.1 - 2019-03-06). In a few places it makes reference to ITI TF-2c

I have looked here https://www.ihe.net/resources/technical_frameworks/#IT but dont find that document - where would I find it?
keep paging down in the supplement you have.
supplements are used for Public Comment and Trial-Implementation, and will include everything that supplement creates or changes.
Ah yes - I see. Makes sense now.
I have 6 CPs that I will send through via email as I can't add them via FTP
